MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Merton Hall and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 7:05AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating reports of trees on the overhead line network close to Blackpark substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. If this information changes we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9AM on 24 October 2020
